verbose_text: This volume of the balloon will cause more stomach distension, which will increase the release of Leptin [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] which are associated with subjective hunger ratings and with lower food intake, and reduces the secretion of Ghrelin [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
